*Bug Report BR-10:*
*Title:*
Cannot withdraw from savings account

*Function Being Tested:*
Transaction withdraw

*Initial State of the System:*
User authenticated at the transaction menu with sufficient funds.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Select Withdraw.
# Select Savings.
# Select $20.

*Expected Outcome:*
ATM should withdraw $20 and provide a receipt.

*Actual Outcome:*
Transaction is cancelled and an invalid account type message is shown.

*Severity / Priority:*
Medium

*Version of SUT:*
V 1.0

column1: [BR-9] ATM won't withdraw with cash that is available in account
column26:
*Bug Report BR-9:*
*Title:*
ATM won’t withdraw with cash available

*Function Being Tested:*
Withdraw

*Initial State of the System:*
ATM has an authenticated card at the transaction menu. Balance inquiry shows total balance $50.50 and available balance $20.50.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Select Withdraw.
# Select Chequing.
# Select $20.

*Expected Outcome:*
ATM should withdraw $20 and provide a receipt.

*Actual Outcome:*
ATM shows insufficient funds message and does not withdraw.

*Severity / Priority:*
High

*Version of SUT:*
V 1.0

column1: [BR-8] System does not give 3 PIN attempts on other card
column26:
*Bug Report BR-8:*
*Title:*
System does not give 3 PIN attempts on other card

*Function Being Tested:*
Invalid PIN entry for new card

*Initial State of the System:*
Other card is inserted into ATM.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Insert card.
# Type card number 4.
# Enter incorrect PIN.

*Expected Outcome:*
ATM should show incorrect PIN message and allow retries.

*Actual Outcome:*
ATM ejects card after one attempt.

*Severity / Priority:*
Low

*Version of SUT:*
V 1.0

column1: [BR-7] Money Market balance inquiry returns money from ATM
column26:
*Bug Report BR-7:*
*Title:*
Money Market balance inquiry returns money from ATM

*Function Being Tested:*
Balance inquiry

*Initial State of the System:*
User authenticated and requests a balance inquiry.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Select balance inquiry.
# Select the Money Market account.

*Expected Outcome:*
ATM should not dispense cash and should display Money Market balance.

*Actual Outcome:*
ATM dispenses $500 cash.

*Severity / Priority:*
High

*Version of SUT:*
V 1.0

*Bug Report BR-6:*
*Title:*
Incorrect to and from transfer accounts

*Function Being Tested:*
Transfer transaction

*Initial State of the System:*
User authenticated at transaction menu.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Select transfer.
# Select chequing to transfer money from.
# Select savings to transfer money to.
# Enter an amount of $20.

*Expected Outcome:*
ATM receipt should show TRANSFER FROM: CHKG TO: SVGS.

*Actual Outcome:*
ATM receipt shows TRANSFER FROM: SVGS TO: CHKG.

*Severity / Priority:*
Critical

*Version of SUT:*
V 1.0

*Bug Report BR-5:*
*Title:*
Incorrect transfer amount

*Function Being Tested:*
Transfer transaction

*Initial State of the System:*
User authenticated at transaction menu.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Select transfer.
# Select chequing to transfer money from.
# Select savings to transfer money to.
# Enter an amount of $20.

*Expected Outcome:*
Receipt amount should be $20.

*Actual Outcome:*
Receipt amount is $19.50.

*Severity / Priority:*
Critical

*Version of SUT:*
V 1.0

column1: [BR-4] Deposit amount not correctly registered in the corresponding account
column26:
*Bug Report BR-4:*
*Title:*
Deposit amount not correctly registered in account

*Function Being Tested:*
Deposit

*Initial State of the System:*
ATM is powered on and at the main transaction menu. $40 in the chequing account.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Select Deposit.
# Choose account.
# Enter $20.
# Insert envelope.

*Expected Outcome:*
Chequing should increase by $20 to $60 total.

*Actual Outcome:*
Chequing account increases by $10 to $50.

*Severity / Priority:*
Critical

*Version of SUT:*
V 1.0

column1: [BR-3] Incorrect card information in the transaction receipt
column26:
*Bug Report BR-3:*
*Title:*
Incorrect information

*Function Being Tested:*
Transaction receipt

*Initial State of the System:*
Processed transaction menu.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# ATM powered on.
# Enter the credit card number 1.
# Enter the correct PIN, 42.
# Click transaction to withdraw.
# Enter the amount.

*Expected Outcome:*
Receipt should read CARD #1.

*Actual Outcome:*
Receipt reads CARD #2.

*Severity / Priority:*
Medium

*Version of SUT:*
V 1.0

*Bug Report BR-2:*
*Title:*
Typo in cancel message

*Function Being Tested:*
Transaction cancellation

*Initial State of the System:*
Transaction menu.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Select Withdraw.
# Press cancel.

*Expected Outcome:*
Message should read “Would you like…”

*Actual Outcome:*
Message reads “Wood you like…”

*Severity / Priority:*
Low

*Version of SUT:*
V 1.0

column1: [MFT-2] Invalid PIN Extension - Correct re-entry after two incorrect PINs, fails to complete transaction
column26:
*Test Case Reference:* TC-40 - Invalid PIN Extension

*Expected Behavior:* When a customer enters an incorrect PIN on the first attempt, then enters the correct PIN on the third attempt, the original transaction (inquiry on checking account) should complete successfully.

*Actual Behavior:*  

----

h3. *Steps to Reproduce*

# Start the ATM system and complete startup sequence
# Insert a readable customer card (Test Card ID: _40_)
# When prompted for PIN, enter an *incorrect PIN* (Attempt 1)
# When prompted for PIN, enter an *incorrect PIN* (Attempt 2)
# When prompted to re-enter PIN again, enter the *correct PIN* (Attempt 2)
# Observe system behavior

----

h3. *Expected Result*

* Original transaction (checking account inquiry) completes successfully
* Correct balance is displayed/printed on receipt
* Transaction is properly logged (message to bank and approval back)

----

h3. *Actual Result*

* Transaction failed with error: Please enter your PIN Then Press ENTER
* System displayed: Please enter your PIN Then Press ENTER

*Severity / Priority:*
Critical

*Version of SUT:*
V 1.0

h3. *Bug Report BR-1:*
*Title:*
Incorrect withdrawal amount

*Function Being Tested:*
Withdraw

*Initial State of the System:*
ATM is powered on and at the main menu.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Insert valid card, #1.
# Enter the correct PIN, 42.
# Press withdraw.
# Click checking.
# Press 2.

*Expected Outcome:*
ATM should withdraw $40.

*Actual Outcome:*
ATM withdraws $60.

*Severity / Priority:*
Critical

*Version of SUT:*
V 1.0

column1: [MFT-1] Invalid PIN Extension - Correct re-entry after one incorrect PINs, fails to complete transaction
column26:
*Test Case Reference:* TC-39 - Invalid PIN Extension

*Expected Behavior:* When a customer enters an incorrect PIN on the first attempt, then enters the correct PIN on the third attempt, the original transaction (inquiry on checking account) should complete successfully.

*Actual Behavior:*  

----

h3. *Steps to Reproduce*

# Start the ATM system and complete startup sequence
# Insert a readable customer card (Test Card ID: _39_)
# When prompted for PIN, enter an *incorrect PIN* (Attempt 1)
# When prompted to re-enter PIN again, enter the *correct PIN* (Attempt 2)
# Observe system behavior

----

h3. *Expected Result*

* Original transaction (checking account inquiry) completes successfully
* Correct balance is displayed/printed on receipt
* Transaction is properly logged (message to bank and approval back)

----

h3. *Actual Result*

* Transaction failed with error: Please enter your PIN Then Press ENTER
* System displayed: Please enter your PIN Then Press ENTER

*Severity / Priority:*
Critical

*Version of SUT:*
V 1.0
